title: You Are Cordially Invited
description: There’s a wedding in the air at Auckland Med, but Reuben wonders if they’ll survive the stress long enough to say, ‘I do’. Cam is directing the entire operation with his combat eyeliner in place, whilst the wedding party is doing its best to ignore him. The pressure is mounting and the cracks are beginning to show.There’s a bachelor party to survive.The paparazzi to outrun.A wedding outfit to confirm.A rugby game to win.A jerk of a father to cope with.A stunning opportunity to consider.A relationship to untangle.And a shocking event that could derail everything.With the universe conspiring against them, Reuben and Cam will have to summon every scrap of belief they have in each other to make it to their vows.
author: Jay Hogan
